mng: classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

exm.pyn: zhēng zhī yǎn bì zhī yǎn

exm.mng: to have a foot in both camps, to have a bet each way, to be having an affair
lit. a lonely body with only a shadow for company, to be all alone (idiom)
lit. a chicken and a bottle of wine (idiom); fig. ready to make an offering to the deceased, or to entertain guests
lit. a chicken and a bottle of wine (idiom); fig. ready to make an offering to the deceased, or to entertain guests
not to mention (idiom); to say not one word, fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic), to censor
